name: Remote Bridge
shortDescription: Control Claude Code remotely from iOS/Android
longDescription:
Remote Bridge enables you to control Claude Code from your mobile device. Send commands, monitor output, and manage your Claude Code sessions from anywhere. Perfect for running commands while away from your desk, quick fixes from your phone, or monitoring long-running tasks.

Features:
- Real-time WebSocket connection for instant feedback
- Typing mode to simulate keyboard input
- API key authentication for security
- Cross-platform support (macOS, Linux, Windows)

Requires the companion mobile app available at: https://github.com/gabrielvisconti89/remote-bridge

companion_app.name: Remote Bridge Mobile App
companion_app.description: iOS/Android companion app for remote control
